# Overview

Setup the basic components of a development environment for the programming language, C.

## Instructions
Install compiler. These are common across different tasks.

```{bash}
sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y git gcc clang llvm lld
# Has to be the same as gcc version
clang++ -v | grep "Selected GCC"
# TODO: Update gcc if so.
sudo apt install libstdc++-12-dev

# Check the versions
gcc --version
clang-14 --version
llvm-config --version
```

Install modern tools.
```{bash}
sudo apt update && sudo apt install clang-tidy cppcheck clang-format
# Check
clang-tidy --version
cppcheck --version
clang-format --version
```

Setup for neovim.
